body:
my apache error.log as follows

[wed nov 14 09:33:01 2012] [error] [client 192.168.4.182] php fatal error:  call to undefined function curl_init() in /var/www/owncloud/3rdparty/php-cloudfiles/cloudfiles_http.php on line 228, referer: http://192.168.150.198/owncloud/

[wed nov 14 09:33:10 2012] [error] [client 192.168.4.182] php fatal error:  call to undefined function curl_init() in /var/www/owncloud/3rdparty/php-cloudfiles/cloudfiles_http.php on line 228

[wed nov 14 09:38:42 2012] [error] [client 192.168.150.198] client denied by server configuration: /var/www/owncloud/data/htaccesstest.txt
[wed nov 14 09:39:35 2012] [error] [client 192.168.4.182] php fatal error:  call to undefined function curl_init() in /var/www/owncloud/3rdparty/php-cloudfiles/cloudfiles_http.php on line 228, referer: http://192.168.150.198/owncloud/
[wed nov 14 09:54:48 2012] [error] [client 192.168.4.182] php fatal error:  call to undefined function curl_init() in /var/www/owncloud/3rdparty/php-cloudfiles/cloudfiles_http.php on line 228
[wed nov 14 09:54:52 2012] [error] [client 192.168.4.182] php fatal error:  call to undefined function curl_init() in /var/www/owncloud/3rdparty/php-cloudfiles/cloudfiles_http.php on line 228
[wed nov 14 09:55:13 2012] [error] [client 192.168.4.182] php fatal error:  call to undefined function curl_init() in /var/www/owncloud/3rdparty/php-cloudfiles/cloudfiles_http.php on line 228
it looks like you don't have curl installed
i think we should check for curl during install or in files_external to prevent this problem in the future.
